# Chat Tabs

![FoundryVTT](https://img.shields.io/badge/FoundryVTT-v12.0.0+-orangered?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Chat Tabs is a FoundryVTT module that splits the chat log into multiple tabs. In its default state, the chat is split into the Rolls tab which contains all the rolls, and the Dialogue tab which contains all the conversation.

### Installation
Enter the manifest link below into the Module Manager's "Install Module" tab.
```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/keneth-dev/foundry-chat-tabs/main/module.json
```
If you wish to install the module manually, you can download the repository as a zip file and extract it to your Foundry's `Data/modules` folder. You will need to rename the extracted folder to `chat-tabs`.

### Configuration
The module currently does not support any user configuration.
